info.title: Orders API
info.description: VTEX OMS is the module in charge of Order Management, Affiliate configuration and Recurring Orders.

get.description: Lists order details by searching through order ID.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Type of the content being sent

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: Order ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of orders according to the filters described below.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Type of the content being sent

parameters.name: f_creationDate
parameters.description: Concatened value sufix {{creationDate}} and range date in Timestamp format

post.description: Change a Status Order to start-handling by Order ID. For example: in case you need change to {{start-handling}} the order status of order Id {{v5025004rjc-09}}, you will have to replace the variables {{orderId}} for {{v5025004rjc-09}} and status to {{start-handling}}

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Type of the content being sent

post.description: Cancel an order by its order ID. For example: in case you need to cancel the order Id {{v5025004rjc-09}}, you will have to replace the variables {{orderId}} for {{v5025004rjc-09}} and {{status}} to {{cancel}}.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Type of the content being sent

post.description: Register an order change of product or amount. Order status that allows Order Change: {{handling}}, {{waiting-for-fulfillment}}, and {{ready-for-invoicing}}.

parameters.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: Content-Type

parameters.name: Accept

get.description: Retrieve an order attachment, by its name and order ID. For example, in case you need to get an attachment from order ID {{v5025004rjc-09}}, you should replace the variables {{orderId}} for {{v5025004rjc-09}} and {{attachmentName}} for the correspondent name of the attachment you're searching for.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Type of the content being sent

post.description: Sends Order invoice notifications. We strongly suggest that you always send the object of the invoiced items. With this practice, the rounding errors will be avoided. It is not allowed to use more than once the Invoice Notification API with the same {{invoiceNumber}}.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Type of the content being sent

patch.summary: Update Order's partial invoice (Send Tracking Number)

get.description: Lists all order conversations by Order ID. For example: in case you need to get details from the conversation in the Order {{v5025004rjc-09}}, you will have to replace the variables {{orderId}} for {{v5025004rjc-09}}.

example.subject: Seu pedido de Produto Seleção SKU ...  foi realizado com sucesso!
example.firstWords: AmbienteQA Pedido realizado com sucesso! realizado em: 09/02/2017 Olá, Melissa. Obrigado por comprar em nossa loja. Os detalhes do pedido en
example.body:
Pedido realizado com sucesso!
realizado em: 09/02/2017

Olá, Melissa.
Obrigado por comprar em nossa loja. Os detalhes do pedido encontram-se abaixo:
Endereço de entrega
Melissa Otero
Praia de Botafogo - 223 - Botafogo
Rio de Janeiro - RJ
22250-040
Forma de pagamento
Boleto Bancário R$ 1.206,50 Imprimir boleto
Pedido nº v976756ambn-01
Fornecido e entregue por AmbienteQA
Tipo de entrega: Normal
✓
PEDIDO REALIZADO
►
PAGAMENTO CONFIRMADO
►
PEDIDO FATURADO
►
PEDIDO ENVIADO
Produto Seleção SKU Rich Selection 3 33 - Rosa
Entrega em até 6 dias úteis.
1x R$ 1.200,00

Itens R$ 1.200,00
Entrega R$ 6,50
Total R$ 1.206,50
Acompanhe seus pedidos no site
ATENÇÃO: O prazo de entrega será considerado somente após a confirmação do pagamento ou imediato em caso de bônus.

Atenciosamente,
Equipe Ambiente QA.

example.subject: Pagamento pendente de Produto Seleção SKU ... !
example.firstWords: AmbienteQA Pagamento pendente realizado em: 09/02/2017 Olá, Melissa. Verificamos que o pagamento referente ao(s) pedido(s) abaixo continua p

Pagamento pendente
realizado em: 09/02/2017

Olá, Melissa.
Verificamos que o pagamento referente ao(s) pedido(s) abaixo continua pendente. Por favor, realize este pagamento para continuar com sua compra.
